name: Retro Rush (MikeIbrahim)
description:
A fast paced top-down shooter with exciting upgrades!

NOTE: There might be an issue where you are insta-dying, but don't worry there is an easy fix! Just go to the Options tab in the Main Menu and click Reset, then reload the browser and you are all set to play :D

Although the game is still in Beta testing, I have created the first 5 levels for all of you to try. I will also be working on more levels and upgrades to make the game more exciting :)

- CONTROLS -

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Space Bar -  Dash (Once you have unlocked it)
